Verses: 1 mazhaiththaazhchchiyaik Kuriththu Eremiyaavukku Undaana Karththarudaiya Vasanam:
2 yoodhaa Dhukkikkiradhu, Adhin Vaasalgal Belanatruk Kidakkiradhu; Tharaimattum Kunindhu, Karigaruththuth Thirigiraargal; Erusalemin Kookkural Ezhumbugiradhu.

3 avargalil Prabalamaanavargal Thangal Siruvargalaith Thanneerukku Anuppugiraargal; Ivargal Pallangalukkup Poith Thanneeraikkaanaamal Verum Paaththirangalode Thirumbivarugiraargal; Vetki Naani, Thangal Thalaiyai Moodikkollugiraargal.
4 dhesaththinmel Mazhai Illaadhadhinaal Tharai Vediththirukkiradhu Payirseygiravargal Vetki, Thangal Thalaiyai Moodikkollugiraargal.
5 veliyin Penmaanum Kuttipottu, Pullillaadhadhinaal Adhaivittu Odippogum.
6 kaattukkazhudhaigal Medugalilnindru Valusarppangalaippol, Kaatrai Utkollugiradhu; Pul Illaadhadhinaal Avaigaludaiya Kangal Pooththuppogiradhu Endraar.
7 karththaave, Engal Akkiramangal Engalukku Virodhamaai Saatchiyittaalum, Ummudaiya Naamaththinimiththam Kirubaiseyyum; Engal Seerkedugal Migudhiyaayirukkiradhu; Umakku Virodhamaaip Paavancheydhom.
8 isravelin Nambikkaiye, Aabaththukkaalaththil Adhin Ratchagare, Neer Dhesaththil Paradhesiyaippolavum Raaththanga Irangugira Vazhippokkanaippolavum Iruppaanen?

9 neer Vidaaiththuppona Purushanaippolavum, Ratchikkamaattaadha Paraakkiramasaaliyaippolavum Iruppaanen? Karththaave Neer Engal Naduvilirukkiravaraame; Ummudaiya Naamam Engalukkuth Tharikkappattumirukkiradhe; Engalai Vittup Pogaadhirum.

10 avargal Thangal Kaalgalai Adakkikkollaamal, Alaiya Virumbugiraargalendru Karththar Indha Janaththaikkuriththu Sollugiraar, Aagaiyaal, Karththaravargalmel Piriyamaayiraamal, Ippozhudhu Avargal Akkiramaththai Ninaiththu, Avargal Paavangalai Visaarippaar.
11 karththar Ennai Nokki: Nee Indha Janaththukku Nanmaiyundaaga Vinnappampannavendaam.

12 avargal Ubavaasiththaalum, Naan Avargal Vinnappaththaikketpadhillai; Avargal Thaganapaligalaiyum Kaanikkaigalaiyum Seluththinaalum, Naan Avargalmel Piriyamaayiruppadhillai; Pattayaththinaalum Panjaththinaalum Kollainoyinaalum Naan Avargalai Nirmoolamaakkuven Endraar.

13 appozhudhu Naan: Aa Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Idho, Neengal Pattayaththaik Kaanbadhillai, Ungalukkup Panjamum Varuvadhillai; Urudhiyaana Samaadhaanaththaiye Ivvidaththil Ungalukkuth Tharuvomendraar Endru Theerkkadharisigal Avargalukku Sollugiraargale Endren.

14 appozhudhu Karththar Ennai Nokki: Theerkkadharisigal En Naamaththaikkondu Poiyaaith Theerkkadharisanan Chollugiraargal. Naan Avargalai Anuppinadhumillai, Avargalukkuk Karpiththadhumillai; Avargalode Pesinadhumillai; Avargal Kalla Dharisanaththaiyum, Kalla Sagunaththaiyum, Illaadha Viseshaththaiyum, Thangal Irudhayaththin Kabadaththaiyume, Ungalukkuth Theerkkadharisanamaai Sollugiraargal.

15 aadhalaal, Naan Anuppaadhirundhum, En Naamaththaikkondu Theerkkadharisanancholli, Indha Dhesaththile Pattayamum Panjamum Varuvadhillaiyengira Theerkkadharisigalaikkuriththu: Ippadippatta Theerkkadharisigal Pattayaththaalum Panjaththaalum Saavaargal.

16 avargalidaththil Theerkkadharisanam Ketkum Janangalum, Erusalemin Veedhigalile Pattayaththaalum Panjaththaalum Azhindhu, Avargalum Avargal Manaivigalum, Avargal Kumaararum, Avargal Kumaaraththigalum Adakkampannuvaarillaamal Kidappaargal; Avargaludaiya Pollaappai Avargalmel Varappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
17 en Kangalilirundhu Iravumpagalum Oyaamal Kanneer Odikkondirukkum; En Janamengira Kumaaraththiyaagiya Kannigai Magaa Vedhanaiyulla Adiyinaalum Kodiya Kaayaththinaalum Sedhappattirukkiraal.

18 naan Veliye Ponaal Idho, Pattayaththaal Kollappattavargal; Nagaraththil Vandhaal, Idho, Panjaththaal Varundhugiravargal, Theerkkadharisigalum Aasaariyargalum Ondrum Ariyaamal Dhesaththil Alaigiraargalennum Indha Vaarththaiyai Avargalukku Sol Endraar.

19 yoodhaavai Mutrilum Veruththeero? Seeyon Ummudaiya Aaththumaavukku Arosigamaayitro? Naangal Aarokkiyam Adaiyak Koodaadhapadi Engalai En Adiththeer? Samaadhaanaththukkuk Kaaththirundhom, Oru Nanmaiyumillai; Aarokkiya Kaalaththukkuk Kaaththirundhom, Idho, Aabaththu.
20 karththaave, Engal Theemaiyaiyum Engal Pidhaakkalin Akkiramaththaiyum Naangal Arindhirukkirom; Umakku Virodhamaaip Paavancheydhom.

21 ummudaiya Naamaththinimiththam Engalai Aruvarukkaadhirum, Umadhu Magimaiyin Singaasanaththaik Kanaveenappaduththaadheyum; Engalode Umakku Irukkira Udanpadikkai Abaththamaagaadhapadi Engalai Ninaiththarulum.

22 purajaadhigaludaiya Veenaana Dhevargalukkul Mazhai Varushikkappannaththakkavargal Undo? Alladhu, Vaanangal Thaanaai Mazhaigalaik Kodukkumo? Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththaraayirukkira Neerallavo Adhai Seygiravar; Aagaiyaal Umakkuk Kaaththirukkirom; Dhevareer Ivaigalaiyellaam Undupannineer.
